title: SME Clutch
description:
SME Clutch helps small business owners who are overwhelmed by complex financial data, causing stress, by providing tools for financial goal setting, tracking and accountability, unlike existing accounting reports which they find difficult to understand.

🏆 Setting goals = 50% more chance of success.
📌 Tracking goals = 76% more likely to succeed.
🔬 Being Accountable = 95% more likely to succeed.

The bookkeeper can manage multiple clients and practices can delegate to their colleagues.
